While off the ship in Key West on cellular, we could not access details of our trip in the app. Before the trip, we weren’t required to be on the ship’s WiFi (obviously) but once the cruise began, they only way we could access our account for information is to be on ship’s WiFi but that isn’t possible in Key West.|

Many of these things were marketed to us as to how VV is better than other cruise lines but it just makes VV seem worse than other cruise ships if they don’t work - bcuz it’s a high expectation that then becomes a frustrating disappointment.|

At the Festival Stage Acts the first night at the manor - we tried to order drinks at the bar and they told us we had to order at our table. Wake brunch was a disappointing experience - especially since we were there to celebrate several birthdays. 02/09/24 06:32PM GSA AC: The guest sent a message on the SQ that read: "What happens if the special restaurants never have an opening? Only wanted the Italian or steak house and they have been booked from start. I keep going to standby, but there are so many people in line. Do we get anything back if the dinners aren't used?//" Can you look and let us know what options are currently available for dinner? Or at least verify it's all booked out like it seems?" // "And if both of those are true, that we simply just don't get the option of eating at a premium restaurant this week even once?" GSA then extended apologies and explained to the guest that due to high counts on this cruise the restaurants are very busy and as he did not have the system to check table availability at the restaurant he could try check with the supervisor directly if they can accommodate them at the restaurant of their choice but then again not guaranteed. The guest then responded as follow:" You should have more options if guests have no availability options to use even one of the 2 slots?I'm already on standby zzz Will never take another virgin cruise because of this. Just make sure you note that somewhere under customer satisfaction due to lack of restaurant availability// It seems like staff is taking care of it for us. Thank you guys. GSA then replied to the guest: "Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We will make sure your comment is shared with the leadership as we are constantly looking forward to improving the service we provide on-board our Lady Ships." The guest then replied saying: "They ended up not being able to help. I hope you guys will be willing to give us something in exchange for the two premium meals we can't get due to you guys not having enough planned availability. So that's a total of 4 premium meals (two for two people)" GSA then informed the guest that he will document his feedback and escalate to the Restaurant Operations Manager who will look into this and revert to them.

02/10/24 05:32 pm GSA AC: Guest  sent a message on the SQ that read:"Hello i would like to express my deepest disappoitment thus far on this trip. In celebration of a friend of ours she grather a few friends to take this trip with her . Suriving Cancer we were all happy to celebrate life and another birthday. We tried our best to plan everything including a beach cabana for today. Her medication and the heat was not a good mix. Our cabana was canceled unknowing to us. This was very disappointing . Expecially since, we were not notified before hand . As a medical professional i find this unprofessional and disappointment for a co//Sorry, I did not finish. I am very disappointed." GSA then replied to the guest as follows: "Ahoy Sherma! Good evening. Thank you for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear that you are disappointed with our service, may we kindly know more information with regards to the cabana . Did you prebook the cabana pre-cruise or you booked it while you were onboard and it when was it cancelled? Please do advise if your friend needs medical assistance so that we can advise our medical team?" The guest then explained: "Firstly she does not me//Firstly, I would like to mention that the individual in question does not require any medical assistance. This is because she is accompanied by two medical providers during her travels. Additionally, we were able to arrange for an umbrella to ensure her comfort. However, it is with great disappointment that we discovered the cabana we had reserved and paid for in January was unexpectedly canceled without any formal notice. While we understand that system errors can occur, it had a significant impact on our experience. I must emphasize that using Company V was initially a pleasurable experience, but it unfortunately marred our last day. Thankfully, my friend is doing well, but as a professional in the medical field, I strongly advise that any substantial purchases be given proper attention, as it is essential to consider unforeseen circumstances where additional care and support may be required. The fact that we did not received all that was promised to us was incredibly upsetting." GSA then replied to the guest as follows: "Thank you Sherma for sharing your detailed feedback with us. I will make sure your comment is shared with the leadership as we are constantly looking forward to improving the service we provide on-board our Lady Ships. I have created a report on this and escalated it to the Excursions Manager to look into."

02/10 SSM: GSM sent an email with the comments from guest: "There were highs and lows so far on the trip. Overall service was great and food quality for the most part was amazing. For the negative our room has constant creaking sound almost as if we were on board an old wooden ship. Though I understand this cruise is more on the "party" side, I was hoping there were dedicated relaxing areas (besides the spa) on the ship. Though there appears to be, it is ruined by the constant loud music at every corner of the vessel. It also makes it difficult to carry a conversation such as when at the pizza parlor. Razzel Dazzel was in line with the online comments I've read regarding sub par customer service. Which was odd because at Pink Agave was among the best I've had on any cruise line. The food there was also "meh" in comparison to food elsewhere on the ship. The main performances are only scheduled once rather than twice a night like other cruises which makes it even more difficult to schedule dining (its hard enough as it is). Lastly the ship layout is odd. I feel at times like I'm going through a corn maze. I've never seen anywhere where the men's and ladies bathroom are at opposite ends. I truly don't get the logic there and why areas are hard to get to/hidden throughout. I feel that for the most part there things can be easily fixed with training. But as of now it seems like this will be my last time at this cruse line. I appreciate the effort of providing a different take to the traditional cruise experience but there is definitely room for improvement."

2/10/24 GSA CANSU - Guest  sent message through SQ: " Had a great time on the cruise. Delicious food and plenty of options. Activities were great as well. My only complaint is the quality of the "deep tissue massage", which did not feel like a deep tissue massage at all. The masseuse was nice but the massage was lack luster and did not feel deep tissue at all. For the price of the massage I expected an experience that would blow me away, but unfortunately it did not. I even expressed a need for extra attention to my upper back but the masseuse spent more time on my legs than my area of most stress. I was going to ask the masseuse to go back to my back but the massage came to and end before i had the chance. There were many delays in the massage so it did not even feel like a full 50 minute experience. I was surprised when she said it was over as the massage part felt like 30 minutes at most. Again great cruise but the massage did sour the experience a bit"

Especially not the extra charge. This whole incident including the double charge and the no stock of beverages, made me very disappointed. Do better Company.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The bed has a thin, unsupportive mattress over a metal frame. It’s really a flimsy futon. Painfully uncomfortable. There is FAR too much noise on the ship, including FABRICATED, ENCOURAGED noise at the Korean restaurant. Performances are deafening. Entertainment venues are painfully loud and vastly overcrowded because the venues are too small. There are massive lines to get on the ship, to book dinners, etc. We’ve been on over a hundred cruises and this was by far the worst. For the first time in our cruising careers, we’re happy to see the cruise end.

02/15/24 12am GSA CC: Guest  sent an SQ message "Today I visited the sip lounge to enjoy their delightful afternoon tea. I waited patiently for about 20 minutes, but unfortunately, the servers seemed to be assisting other customers who arrived after us. My room mate and I were still waiting for someone to come and take our order. We received assistance only after I had to flag down a server. As we were finally served, we couldn't help but notice that others who arrived after us were helped immediately. I must confess that I experienced a certain emotional response. On other occasions, when we visited the sip lounge, Kenneth was the one who promptly assisted us. I'm uncertain about the necessity of training your staff to be more attentive to all customers (which is the impression I got), but it did leave a negative impression and made me have a negative experience at the sip lounge. My experience at the sip lounge would have been negative if it weren't for Kenneth's presence during my previous visits. Thank you Kenneth for ensuring that my time at the sip lounge was enjoyable."// "In addition, if I don't see Kenneth we will not be stopping at the sip lounge."

The Assistant Casino Manager approach Mr. Miller and told him that he would have to double check with the Slot Manager since this is an unusual request.
After a discussion to find the best solution for this request, both the Assistant Casino Manager and Slot Manager spoke with Mr. Miller to explain him that unfortunately there is no option to print a players card; however, they can monitor his play and they could estimate they points and add them to his account after he is done playing. Mr. Miller was happy with the resolution and thank both Managers. After the resolution of his request, Mr. Miller drop his frustration in regards to the overall experience onboard, since boarding he has struggled with his luggage, room ('bad smell') and appliances not working on his room (TV). The Assistant Casino Manager and Slot Manager apologize and empathize with Mr. Miller who requested if he could speak with someone 'as close as the Captain' as he is not having a good time and is just a bad experience after another. The Assistant Casino Manager told Mr. Miller that he would contact the Guest Services team and a Manager will be in contact with him. He was happy with this and he is expecting a follow-up on his case.

2/18/2024 GSA CANSU - Guest  sent message through SQ: Hi, I’d like to speak to someone about a problem I’m having! Yes, we’re out at the moment! I’ve spoken to a few crew members about this, I’m looking for a quiet spot in the shade and it appears that no one can help me. the only place that is quiet and shaded is Richard’s Rooftop, but no one can help with access. this is the third day it’s been loud and too sunny for me to sit outside in peace, it’s very disappointing. GSA Cansu replied: "Ahoy Jenna, the most quiet deck is deck 17, The Perch, back of the ship. I am sure that you can find peace in there. Guest  replied : "No unfortunately both the perch and deck 17 are in full sun. I’ve checked both the back and front of the ship, we’re currently at The Dock and the music is blaring from the bar AND the shore. Is it possible to upgrade to get access to the quiet Richard’s Rooftop? My friends have sailed with virgin before and have been given influencer access to it, is that an option? GSA Cansu replied: " To having the access for the Richards Rooftop, you should have a Rockstar Room booked or have a VIP status that we can provide service in there. Otherwise we do not have an option to upgrade your on board status with the access. Guest  Jenna asked: "What is the criteria for VIP status. GSA replied: "For example, Guest s who are working collaborate with marketing or advertisement. Guest  asked : "Could you provide me with a name and number? GSA replied: "You can find in Company Voyages website.Please check > cruiseservices.com. Guest  replied: "That doesn’t appear to be an active link, I can’t seem to access it…if you cannot help me, what are my options for disembarking and booking a flight home? We are really unhappy with our experience at this point. GSA replied: For the disembarkation day you can choose your preferred disembarkation time. To do so, please just follow few easy steps on your Guest  App:
Discover ? Book excursion ? Miami Disembarkation Group ? Choose from the available timings .
Debarkation slots are available from 7.30am to 10.30am . For your transportation and booking flight to home, you need to arrange by yourself in your mean time. If you would like to leave the ship today, please inform me about your flight time and what time you would like to disembark, so that we can inform Clearance Officer accordingly. " Guest  replied "Is there someone I can speak to in person? I’m concerned that going back and forth with you will cause me to miss my window of time to leave. GSA said:"Ahoy Jenna, we are all willing to help you. Please let me know about your concerns. " Guest  replied:  did just outline everything above… my concerns are there is nowhere I have access to on this ship that is outside, quiet and shaded. I’ve been provided no options by your team and have explored the entire ship. The only option I can see is Richard’s rooftop but I’ve been told there that is not possible. This is not the experience that was advertised, if there are no options available to me we’d like to know who can help us book travel details home.To be clear, for today. " GSA replied: As we mentioned before, unfortunately we are not providing Guest s booking flight to your home, if you would like to disembark, you need to inform us about your flight details and what time you would like to disembark, so that we can inform Clearance Officer accordingly." Guest  asked : "So you can’t give me any other options?" GSA Berenice replied : "Ahoy Jenna, we can assist you with the process to disembark, all the flight arrangements are on you. Meanwhile kindly allow us to share this with our Clearance officer to verify if there's something specific you need to provide to us. (Like the port fee for disembark just in case is applied on this Port) . May you need additional assistance please let us know or stop by Guest Services Desk - Deck 5 at your convenience time. "

Feb 17th at 21:00 RSM received a call from SS informing Guest  Shakella would like to speak with RSM. While RSM was on the way, Guest  reported to GSA that she needed help in the Groupie deck 7 as they had reservations but the room was occupied. GSA sent a message to Entertainment group asking for assistance. RSM proceeded to Groupie and met with the Guest . She explaine to RSM that Guest s from 13011A had requested to be booked for two hours in a row and their RSA confirmed. However, when the Guest s arrived the first reservation (8pm to 9pm) was stroke by other Guest s who put their own names and took usage of the Purple Room. Guest  Shakella (travel agent) was then contacted by them to solve the situation. She approached the Guest s to explain that 13011A was booked for the room, and as the Pink Room was available, she invited them to enjoy the other room. Guest s accepeted and all worked well, however, Shakella shared her frustration as she is a Rockstar on vacation and should not be working. This took her time of enjoyment. RSM extended apologies to the Guest  and advised her he came to check on them as fast as possible, but she had "fixed" the situation before. Guest  appreciated RSM coming over to check on them. RSM invited the Guest s for some drinks but she refused as she was going to bed. Treat Yourself Menu to be offered.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Having cruised with the company over the summer (Departure port: Athens) we were excited to come back. We are highly disappointed in this experience. Knowing we booked this cruise last minute (due to personal schedule) we haven’t been able to make any dinner reservations. We had success one night to make a “waiting list” at razzle dazzle, but were told by every other restaurant that they were booked for the week. This is unacceptable for the money paid and the experience that’s advertised.  It has made dinner a stress and unenjoyable. With this in mind, we went from raving about virgin to probably not cruise again with the company.

Q: Vibe at the terminal?, A: 3
Q: Service?, A: 5
Q: Check in process?, A: 3
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Your app is complete garbage. We pay $1000 plus dollars for a cruise and have to fight your app to book anything. I had to go to customer service three times for issues with your app. It would not even play the safety video. Next up I bought one drink at the bar with no issues and then when I order a second one I’m told that I have to go back to customer service for a fourth time because there is a problem with my account. I’ve sailed on Norwegian three times and it was some of the most relaxing trips I’ve ever had.  I had nothing but complete stress the first two hours I was on this ship due to your technology failures. There is no way that you don’t know that this is an issue because your app rates 1.6 in the App Store. Everyone hates it.  At this point in my cruise I would never book Company again. I seriously hope conditions approve because I paid a lot of money for this vacation and so far it has been a complete disappointment. I considered getting off the ship before it left Miami because I was so stressed out.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: 1. We paid extra money for a sea terrace XL but these rooms don’t have the glass front to see the ocean, so I sit on my balcony and stare at a wall of metal. 
2. The rooms are RIGHT next to the mechanical room both next us and below us so we hear banging and loud noises-enough to wake you up from a dead sleep or keep you from sleeping. HORRIBLE ROOMS-and we paid MORE for them! I’m just so disappointed with them.
3. One of our rooms hadn’t been cleaned properly at all’s hair tie left in the shower from the previous people are no hand soap either. I had to track someone down no less than 4 times on our arrival day for different reasons and then had to call that night because the pillows I had asked for never arrived. 
4. The app has been terrible this trip. Wouldn’t work AT ALL the entire time we were in Miami so by the time it started working, tons of things were already sold outs so we had no opportunity to attend several things we had anticipated being able to enjoy while on the cruise. 
5. Many of the restrooms around the ship either had no toilet paper or were out of hand soap or the sinks didn’t work. 
6. There was no drag queen bingo onboard, which was our favorite activity from the last cruise. Not being able to see the lineup before you book just doesn’t sit will with me. Had I known this particular cruise was going to be all poker tournaments and no drag queen bingo, I never would have purchased this particular cruise. 
Overall-we LOVED our first cruise and couldn’t wait to get back on for our second cruise. After this one, I doubt that we will cruise again With VV. There are too many other cruise lines to try and this one just made us realize that so many others have better things to offer and have a higher level of customer service.

02/23/24 @23:22 GSA Barbara: Guest  sent message on Support Queue "I wanted to take some time to provide feedback. This is my third virgin cruise in two years. We’ve loved the first two so much that we’ve gifted future cruise vouchers to our family and friends to experience it themselves. More over, for my moms 60th birthday celebration, I saved up to take her on one this weekend. Unfortunately, if this trip had been my first virgin cruise, it would be my last. My mom gets motion sickness and is a light sleeper, and I told her that this ship would be great because it’s quiet and you don’t feel the motion. I wasn’t afforded an option to purchase a central terrace during booking and this was our only weekend we were available to go. Once receiving our room number I panicked. I was worried about the back of the ship and 8th floor for motion and the noise from the entertainment below so I tried to level upgrade to at least a larger room on a higher floor. By the time I received the room location, our flights were booked and my mom was ecstatic to finally take her first real vacation in years. So I decided to stay quiet and hope for the best. But regardless of that, for the price I paid to treat my mom, i have been embarrassed all weekend long by all of the things i had experienced in the past that i knew she would love and appreciate. I want to start by saying the crew, per usual has been amazing. David has tended to our every need. When We got in on day one, our room carpet was stained likely from a previous guest spilling food in drips, the mirror and roomet in room has residue smears, the people who stayed before us tore up wall and roomets, the lights on the wall were hanging down from the wall (I fixed). Our bed wall panel vibrated so loud with the ship movement (I have a video) that we couldn’t sleep in night one. I’m a big planner, and this itinerary was chosen because I had done it before and never had a problem feeling the ship move. Unfortunately, at the back of the ship even I have felt it and my poor mother does too. To add to my embarrassment, the music blaring from directly under our room in the Dock or the karaoke each night. I understand that this is fun for everyone but we haven’t been able to sleep before midnight any of the nights. My mom has been an angel telling me that it’s no big deal, but I know that it’s because I’ve paid for the entire trip and she doesn’t want me to feel badly. If I had known at time of purchase that our room location would be where it was, I would not have booked this trip. This is all to say I really believe it could be beneficial to your future guests to have the option to select their room if they aren’t doing a lock it in rate. I hope that this feedback proves beneficial. And if not, thanks for taking the time to read it anyway. Also, the internet is the worst it’s ever been. My network is consistently not working or able to connect to the app."
Comment: too slow, low rating

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Once seated, next to a bus station, a staff member spilled several plates right behind my husband. Dinner courses were delivered without clearing previous courses.  
Staff does not seem to possess "situational awareness"
of the pacing of the dinner and just delivers whatever comes from the kitchen, without considering whether the previous course is completed.  Managers do not seem to be assisting or supporting (training) their staff.  This was our experience on the last two evenings, although our first dinner in Test Kitchen was flawless.  Thanks for asking.  We'd truly like to see service delivery improve.

I waited... and waited... and waited.... until I asked another person  that did the same job as she since its not a alcoholic Drink could I get two coconut waters he said sure got them under two minutes and went on doing what he was doing. I  spoke to a gender not sure of but it said nothing but the Drink was FREE! OF COURSE its Water!! I  wanted to pay a down payment on a cruise again but my husband and I had a serious second thoughts due to this treatment at Bimini. No apologies the girl Jazmin literally looked at me in my Face rolled her eyes and the Gender just looked with no remorsefulness both could careless I do YouTube video and I will definitely be posting my blog on YouTube and the important facts of this trip I experienced. I am not looking for hand out or Freebies. My husband and I not people of that nature but good customer service. This my first trip on Company cruises. I will definitely get home and make sure the owner 
Sir Richard  Branson get a letter from me to know exactly how his workers treat his customers  also "Apollo" will hear from me. All the good I will say is on this review is You guys DO HAVE  A COUPLE EXCELLENT EMPLOYEES that Won't unnoticed  "FAISAL"  CLEANING  DEPARTMENT  8TH FLOOR EXCELLENT MAN  GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The romance package was misleading with the shake for champagne. Until we got on board we assumed you got champagne at any time each day. The treats only served on last 2 nights? We wanted our romance to start right away. The dinners were excellent food was great. The last night we scheduled as our special night. The only time we could do a show that was available was 10 pm and yep at 9 it was cancelled. No option to rebook as it was the last night. We the shows “selling” out this was very disappointing. The ap is awful. From day one of download through the entire cruise and when we asked about it we got a “yes, we know but it gets better when we are out at sea” well that’s a nope it doesn’t! Also telling us the are washing balconies during the cruise at 9:30 am was disappointing for us as we were going to sleep in that day since our tour was 2:30pm. Individually this issues were things you could overlook but all together made for a disappointing cruise.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Overall, and my first experience of cruising, I don’t think I have been delighted with it. 

- breakfast wasn’t fantastic and didn’t quite know what was happening. I requested several items from the waitress, and they either came incorrect, or not what I ordered.
- on deck 16, during the day, the music was too loud and wasn’t offered a drink at all. Instead, had to go down to deck 15 every time I wanted a drink. 
- issues with credit card, despite being uploaded in advance and checked at checkin. When asked at Guest Services, the colleague had no clue as to what it could be. 
- went to Razzle Dazzle last night, and was completely lost with the menu. Didn’t know what was happening, or what was supposed to be received. Very little explanation on the menu, and it was just confusing overall - we were sitting on a table and all three tables to the right of us sent one course back, at least, for not liking it!!
- the general ‘attentiveness’ of service is not fantastic. For example, was in the Sip lounge, and had to wait 15 minutes for someone to take the order and that was only after calling someone over. Another example is the room wasn’t cleaned until c.midday. 

I recognise that, maybe, my expectations are not quite right. I, several times a year, stay in Company Limited Edition hotels, and having stayed in most of these, they different vastly from a virgin cruise - I wasn’t expecting this, as it is part of the wider ‘virgin group’ but recognise that, maybe, I shouldn’t compare.
Air Conditioning
Toilet Not Flushing

Also, last time there was ketchup, salt and pepper. This time none of those things. And finally, my roasted potatoes were still raw, barely cooked through. Not an enjoyable breakfast to say the least. The quality seems to have decreased since my last cruise in December 2022.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Food is less than stellar and akin to military mess hall quality. There is a dearth of quality non-fru-fru dishes for the non-foodie. Astonished that VV won awards on the food quality. Dining reservations are difficult but there is no real choice as a food option for the non-foodie but nightly burgers or pizza. Each “specialty” dining option has left us looking for other options (again burgers and pizza). As a travel agent and blogger/podcast I have an issue recommending the main dining options. The Test Kitchen should be an experience not an other dining option. I’m underwhelmed as a whole regarding dining options and quality.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I sailed on Valiant Lady for the first time last Nov 2023...and Extra Company was very good on that cruise. Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 3
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 1
Q: Menu choices?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Unfortunately for me I sailed on Valiant Lady in 2023 Nov. Pink Agavae was a highly recognised food venue and it lived up to my expectations ..But here on Scarlet they failed miserably. Although our staff was nice. The food was just not well prepared, it wasmt freshly prepared or hot...(luke warm at best) There just seemed to be too much going on with wayyyy to many staff moving around at the same time. I understand being busy and all. But we actually waited a very long time for our main course entree's, very tight seating arrangements the back of my chair was right by a supporting column which was also a high trafficked pass through and the back of my chair was bumped several times by patrons and staff. I applaude Pink Agave for attempting to accomodate guest but there were sooo many other spaces that had no activity at all that couldve been used to "spread people out" more. I also loved the musical vibe but the DJ just played it a bit too loud which caused diners to have raise our voices and people were basically talking over each other so that they could be heard

27th feb. 8am. Guest  contacted her Mrsa that her blue short sleeve top is missing from her laundrey, that she had 1 pants and 1 top. Mrsa went down to laundrey to check and on their logs when they count the laundrey they had stated only 1 pair of pants. Mrsa relayed this information on to her guest and her guest replied "I know I put the top in there, but I understand these things can happen". Mrsa said she will keep checking. That evening Mrsa went back down to laundrey and spoke with the guy who actually did her laundrey and he can swear he only counted 1 pair of pants, no top. Mrsa contacted guest to let her know she will keep checking incase anything has been missed.
When ordering a drink the bartender was moving very fast and spilled half my shot on the counter and still served me the drink.

Q: Tell us everything!, A: The bed is rock hard. The food options are terrible. Lunch doesn’t start until after noon. Not everything is open during eating times. Walk ins for the restaurants is a joke it’s just standby in case someone cancels. Very minimal activities. The board games are missing pieces. Took us to an excursion that had kids all over that resort. Had our Original cruise cancelled and had to settle for this one. Directions on the ship are awful. I will never recommend a virgin cruise to anyone

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Food Choices are not appealing. Wanted to do a walk in at The Wake and was told we couldn’t get a table unless someone cancelled their reservation. That is not how you portrayed walk in dining. The beds are not comfortable. I Have gotten undercooked meals, bad service, and just a lack of service from some of the staff. The way you swap from breakfast to lunch is ignorant and not organized. This has not been a very appealing cruise and probably wouldn’t go on another one nor recommend to a friend. The resort we went to in Cozumel was littered with kids and the kayaks and snorkeling just not what was portrayed on the advertisement. Why does someone having type 2 diabetes that is controlled a problem to go “snorkeling” which was just swimming in shallow water with a life vest and a snorkel. Our original cruise was cancelled abruptly due to lack of planning on Yal part. Directions on the ship are horrible and very confusing due to the lack of signs. This has just not been a great trip for me and my wife. I had great service by a couple of your bartenders but other than that not so good.

Guest s seated at Table 53 ordered the "Treat Yourself" Halibut Lobster, a chargeable item from the menu. After consuming the lobster, they expressed dissatisfaction, citing that the halibut was undercooked, and the accompanying civicche of scarloops was excessively sour.

The supervisor engaged with the guests, collecting detailed feedback on the undercooked halibut and the overly sour scarloops. 
To ensure accuracy, the supervisor consulted with the chef regarding the preparation of the dish, confirming the validity of the guests' complaints.

Tell us everything!, A: The Wake....hmmmm...Second time around...2nd strike...Lets see what happens in Dec 2024 because we will be back on another Company Voyage...We arrived at 9pm were seated within 5 mins. We didnt recieve our appetizers or mains until almost 1030 no BS! there seemed to be alot of mis understandings with our waitress who was very nice but...not sure why the dsiconnect because we were very clear about what we wanted to eat. In all we recieved clam chowder that was luke warm at best and my I requested bone marrow which was not hot..and my main (shrimp and grits) came out with my off the grill entree which was not cooked as requested. One waitress didnt know the diff from Sprite and Mineral water...After several misunderstandings and with time winding down we had to leave. We requested that our meals be sent to our room. Once recieving our food we had a total of 6 different items that were all stuffed into 2 containers..so our sides were mixed into our mains and even some items were never even put in. I called and explained what happened and $7 was removed but the Wake once again failed us miserably...We had our first wake experience on Valiant Lady...it too was dissapointing

03/03/24 @12:45PM @GSA Barbara: Guest  Paul came to SS reporting that his father had an accident in the morning while disembarking in Puerto Plata. Guest  Andre is wheelchair bound, he has partial use of his upper body. While disembarking, the ramp on the Gangway had an app. 10 cm gap between the ramp and the ground. As guest went on the round with his scooter due to the gap his front wheels bumped to the ground which changed the balance of the scooter and guest fell forward to the ground. Guest  fell face first and had multiple bruises on his body, some surface scratches, his glass broke however both his knees got injured, one side more seriously. Medical response and assistance came after 5 minutes, and guest Andre feels okay. Guest  was advised to go to the Medical Center for another check up in the afternoon. Guest  Paul says this was due to negligence and would like to ring our attention to the gap that was there. He says coming back onboard there was already an extra ramp attached, as seen on the photos. Guest  Paul said other guests told him he could sue the company for negligence as the attached extra ram could have been attached earlier. Guest  says he is not here for that however he would like to bring our attention to what have happened as it could have ended up much worse.

3/04/2024 STS MANUELA - Guest  John joined the Sailing Catamaran and Coral Reef Experience in Puerto Plata on 03/03/2024.

3/4/24 // 12:05PM // GSA TT: Guest  sent a message through SQ: "Yesterday’s ATV Countryside excursion in D.R. was dreadful and the quality/value was not close to being worth what we paid. We spent the entire day mostly on the open-air truck ride to and from the location, only rode the ATVs 20 minutes, and was told we had to wait before and after riding because they didn’t have enough ATVs. There were almost 50 people signed up and they only had 16 ATVs so they divided the group by 3, they did this coin toss process to determine who had to sit around and wait. We left the port late, so everything thereafter seemed rushed. We were last to head back to the port and initially it seemed we wouldn’t make it back in time because we had to wait for group 3 to ride the ATVs and stop by a woman’s house for a few minutes for an espresso. Also, the helmets for our heads were not thoroughly cleaned and disinfected between users which exposes each people to communicable diseases and germs. I watched as people were directed off and on the ATVs, likely due to tight schedule, and a guy walked by and randomly sprayed a little Lysol inside, which is not supposed to go on things that we wear on our bodies, and did not attempt to clean the eye covering. On the truck ride back, we got stuck on the dirt road because cars and people attending a funeral blocked the road, so we were just sitting waiting and then the truck ran over a motorcycle which was stuck under the truck. Some local people got it out. There was absolutely no cellular reception so there was no way to alert the ship as to our location or what was happening. When we finally made it back, I realized we had been gone 6 hours for an excursion that was supposed to be 3 hours; the whole day was practically gone so we had no time to shop in D.R. as we needed to swiftly get back onboard the ship."

03/03/24 11:45pm GSA AC: The guest sent a message on SQ that read: " Company Voyages had such a great thing going. The first time I was on it was an awesome cruise. Now I am on it and it is a mess. Every restaurant is booked for every time slot, no space for walk ins. I lost $6k in the casino in the first two days, the best the casino host could do is get a 9:30pm spot for us at the wake. If you can't accommodate the passengers, open the restaurants at 5 instead of 5:45. I enjoyed my last cruise and food was great, but I won't be back if I end up having to eat in the Galley because no decent restaurant has any space to serve us. As a travel agent, I will also inform my clients if the scarcity of dining reservations and not to get their hopes up to get the quality food I told them about the first time I was on!" GSA then responded to the guest with a message that read:" Ahoy Peter! Good evening. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. I will make sure your comment is shared with the leadership as we are constantly looking forward to improving the service we provide on-board our Lady Ships. We are sincerely sorry that you haven't had any luck with your dining reservations during this busy cruise. Again as mentioned we have created a report on this and escalated it to our Restaurant Operations Manager.

Upon arrival, the receptionist walked me to a locker and walked away without at any point explaining how the locker locked, what spa amenities I could or could not use, or really any helpful information whatsoever. I booked a 75 minute deep tissue massage, and my masseuse Arcel essentially just inconsistently rubbed lotion and oil on my skin for 75 minutes. To say there was zero pressure is perhaps an overstatement. I say this in the spirit of constructive feedback and hopefully some retraining. I was disappointed to leave spending so much money and feeling the opposite of relaxed."

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The service (for the most part) is horrible. There have been a couple of people who were great such as D at Extra Company out first night, Naveen at the Wake for brunch, Jessa in the galley, & one helpful custodian who’s name I failed to get. 

Almost every meal had been served cold.

The clientele leaves little to be desired (though I realize this isn’t some the company can control). The fact there were swingers at the PJ party nearly having sex on the lounger my friends & I (and others) were on with crew walking by without saying anything is disgusting. 

Sadly, I’m an avid cruiser but will not sail with VV again. This has been a huge waste of money & loss of vacation time. I do believe the company should do some better marketing to allow those of us who might be considered “prudes” a better idea of how to set expectations.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This rating is about the Horserace painting/Ali the Artist, but there was no category for that so this was the closest. We’ve done the seahorse race multiple times before and both times with Ali have been subpar and awkward experiences especially compared with other Happenings Cast interactions. She has a standoff demeanor and makes it seem like the Guest s are inconveniencing her scheduled. Every other race we’ve done, the artist has offered two sessions or at least one two hour session. Here we were offered one one-hour session or to be sat on the side of a separate event. While I know this isn’t a directed session, other artists have made themselves available, offered some input and suggestions, or at least had fun and positive interactions during the session. She also maintained more of an authoritarian attitude during the painting and racing session than lighthearted fun. While our group wasn’t impacted, one group was a little late for the race coming from Drag Bingo and they were only afforded a few minutes to arrive (we were also told we could be a few mins late while the mock race was completed), yet the mock race and intros took close to 30 minutes. We’ve had very positive connections with other Happenings cast members over our 11 Company Voyages but Ali doesn’t seem to invite those interactions.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Company Voyages has been my cruiseline of choice since 2021. I've cruised 7 times and booked two groups on Company. But I see things changing. I feel like you are becoming more like every other cruiseline. It use to be that every crew member would speak to you. Now not only do they not speak but they seem to always be annoyed. Of course there are exceptions but this now seems to be the norm. I have always raved about the food. Now not so much. Again, as the ships have gotten more towards capacity at cruises, your attempt to make it more efficient, you've made it feel like other cruiselines. The galley use to feel special in itself that you could walk around and view what selections were available, then sit down and be waited in. Now, while convenient and probably quicker, you stand in line, tell them what you want, and they prepare it and hand it to you when ready. New take on buffet. Then I made a reservation at the test kitchen after looking at the menu on the app for that evening only to get there and be told that that menu wasn't available until two days from then. I had tried this particular menu before and did not like it. So I was very disappointed. I would not have booked had I known. You also changed the menu at Razzle Dazzle. While there are those who like smoked flavor, it is an acquired taste. A few items are fine but it seemed that since it's in vogue, you want to make it the main flavor for most of the dishes. Smoked flavored cream burlee. Seriously! Next, you used to have excellent shows. Different, but that's what made them special. Now it seems like very little effort it put into them. I am so sorry that I sound so negative, but I loved everything about the Company Voyages Brand. So seeing you become more and more mainstream is disappointing. I loved how special I felt rather I was in a regular room or suite. I understand business, profit and stakeholders, but please don't forget Richard Brandon's vision for a casual luxury sustainable cruiseline.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I paid for 3 hours at redemption spa and noticed I was charged for 6. I went Monday from 9-12. During that time there was no water available anywhere from 9-10:30. Considering you are in saunas and steam rooms that is dangerous. I was so dehydrated when I left. I was given a locker and no other instructions. I was traveling with a friend and she had our bar credits on her wrist thing so if I wasn’t with her I couldn’t drink and Tuesday night mine wasn’t even charged to hers it was charged to mine. This was not the cruise for me I guess. I thought having no kids would be great and relaxing but instead it was a frat party for four days. We went to the Test Kitchen for dinner. I’d have to say the worst meal ever. I didn’t stay for the entire thing. On the app what the menu was advertised was not what was served. I dont eat fish and my only other option was lamb which I don’t like. The app menu said it was beef. It was very uncomfortable for me. I realize the manager of the test kitchen was trying to help but I was insulted. He came to the table and said maybe this wasn’t for me and I could go to another restaurant. I say maybe if you had the right menu this wouldn’t have happened. Our room steward was wonderful as well as our server at blue agave. The one thing I was really hoping to do was the bungie workout. I tried to sign up as soon as I boarded at 2:00 and all the slots were already full.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: There are too many bars on this ship and not enough quality restaurants.  We’ve been on many cruises, however this is the first Company cruise we’ve taken .. We SMELLED VOMIT on numerous occasions walking through the ship .  Obviously from people vomiting alcohol from being drunk .  The fact there are NO quality restaurants without making a reservation is unacceptable for us .  We could not get a reservation due to all of them being sold out nightly.  We felt ripped off quite frankly . You advertise Company as a higher quality experience but in reality you are actually cruise a floating bar so that you can bring in extra very lucrative bar bucks! You seriously need to rework the entire experience. Yes bars are fine but quality (and available) meals and entertainment are also an important part of the overall cruising experience. The hype on the scarlet night experience was a total disappointment.  We attended .. wore red and felt the whole experience was a bar crawl that was a total bore .  Dancing was minimal what we saw and we left .  The wedding was a bit strange . Some of the crew members were not trained in that realm and whole thing was amateur.  Disappointment is what best describes our experience on this ship .

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This is our first Company cruise . We have sailed  Princess several times and  Celebrity and carnival cruises . Most of all the food and dining fall well below our expectations .  Our coffee every morning is never hot .   It’s just warm after putting our cream in it.  Room service is always booked as is this dining situation you have on this ship .  The food in the food court set up you have is below average from our experiences of dining on other ships.   When we wake up and can’t get a hot cup of coffee without having to purchase it at that coffee bar ..  it’s very annoying .  Last night we had reservations in Korean BBQ…  but we refuse to sit in group sitting so we left .  The fact that we pay high prices then are forced to sit with other passengers to dine is unfair .  We are non drinkers . Bring forced to sit with other passengers that are drinking heavily is not what we expect from booking this cruise .  We had to eat the Chinese food in the food court and the selection is pitiful and the sweet and sour chicken was slimy and gross .

IM created for record purposes. Guest s had no dining reservations booked pre cruise, RSA Mel made bookings for the two guests every evening at different restaurants before the guests embarked. RSA Mel met with guests on embarkation and advised guests that she had made them bookings. Guest s were thankful and mentioned that they are cruise with 2 other non-Rockstar guests and that they would like to add them to the dinner reservations, however at this time they did not know what the other guests plans were and that they would let RSA Mel know. RSA Mel did advise guests that the restaurants do book up and that it is harder to get bookings with more than 2 guests. Guest  Cecelia messaged RSA Mel on 03/06 requesting that she cancel their dinner reservation at The Wake for that evening. Guest  Cecelia messaged again at 21:08pm requesting that their dinner tomorrow be made to include 8 people, RSA Mel replied requesting the room numbers of the people to add. Guest  Cecelia only replied to the message (with one of the room numbers only, and now only requesting to add 6 people) at 11:44am the next day. RSA Mel checked with admin reservationist if it was possible to add the extra guests to the Extra Company booking and it was not possible, RSA Mel advised the guest of this. Guest  Cecelia then asked at 8pm that night that RSA Mel to add the guests to the bookings for the rest of the cruise, RSA Mel requested the other guests room numbers and made the request in the reservations group. Guest  enquired at 5pm if the other guests were added, RSA Mel advised that there was no feedback as yet. RSA Mel went to Pink agave at 6pm to queue there and see if the other guests could be accommodated along with the booking for the 2 Rockstars, there was no space for them, RSA Mel informed guest. RSA Mel went to Razzle Dazzle and made a reservation there for 8 people, guest was not happy to eat there and cancelled the reservation. RSA Mel went to Test Kitchen and made a reservation there for 8 people, guest was not happy and cancelled the reservation. RSA Mel went to Extra Company to see if they could accommodate, there was no availability. RSA Mel did not enquire at Korean BBQ as the guests had Korean BBQ booked for the next night. At 9pm RSA Mel was in the queue at Pink Agave to see if they could accommodate the guests, reservationist advised that if the guests come now then they can be seated. RSA Mel advised the guests and guest said that they have already eaten and dont want the reservation. Guest s advised that they wanted to have at least one dinner with all of their friends and that this situation was becoming aggravating. Guest s demanded to have Extra Company, The Wake or Pink Agave for all 8 of them for the following night. RSA Mel went to Extra Company at 21:30pm and asked that they please assist to accomodate the guests, the only time that was possible was 8:45pm. Dinner was booked and guests advised.
Guest s came to GB and mentioned to the server that she had some kind of pepper allergy which one she’s was not sure.
The guest is having dinner in Korean BBQ and mentioned to the server that she has lactose intolerance.

There were several issues from the Guest s' side during dinner- first, after Guest s were offered one of the best tables in restaurant (2 top, right in front of the window) they complained that they don't like the table as it's too small for the amount of food; they were offered alternative table; once the food was served Guest s were observed using their own, single-use plastic utensils; Guest s were checked upon after each course by server (Gede); towards the end of their meal Guest s were approached by RS Bart and asked about their experience- this is when they described their complaints; Guest s said that they did not like that the server was talking about Elevated Voyage cards, they interrupted him saying that "they just want the food"; they mentioned that they did not enjoy the service even though Gede was maintaining the table to the best of his abilities; also the way Guest s used to describe the server when asked by RS Bart was rather disrespectful, showing that they did not like the assigned server from the start; Guest s also mentioned that they did not enjoy any of thee food- Chicken Wings were bland, salad was soggy, cauliflower was too spicy and lamb was average; Guest s were thanked for the feedback and assured that we will look into discussed matters in order to avoid any negative experience for the future;

(Special event, Elevate Voyage Programming, Just needed to use your PTO?), A: Wanted to try a different cruise line and have had good experiences with Companys others businesses. Must admit our final day on board was the best and if the entire experience had been at this level my opinion of Company Voyages would be very good, but unfortunately the first 3 days did not meet expectations. The Wake restaurant was however fantastic! Both the service and food were exceptional! If we had been able to get reservations at other restaurants onboard I think our opinion of the overall cruise might be completely different. The availability of seating in restaurants is wholly inadequate and needs to be addressed in the worst way. The food quality in the Galley is very institutional, and poor quality. Staff were helpful but this did not overcome the poor food quality. I know you have the ability to create quality food, I fount this at the Wake.

She was showing signs of heavy intoxication, so I sent a message to the Casino-Bar Team group on Workchat to stop serving her alcohol. Shortly after, I`ve seen message from the SERV SAFE group that she has been pointed out there too. Mrs. Ashley Neff did not start playing rather than socializing around her husband`s table, but occasionally I could see that she is “wobbly”, and that she is not able to keep balance when standing. Occasionally I could overhear swear words too that were addressed to her husband or to the other gentleman. I have alerted the Casino Supervisors of her state and I have advised them to pay attention to the table in case she needs assistance. Soon after, Mrs. Ashley Neff sat down next to her husband, and I could hear that she calls him M…. r F…. r. I double checked if everything is fine with them, and I asked them if they would require any assistance to be escorted to the room later. I tried to reinstate that they are both fine, but Mrs. Ashley was aggravated already, telling me to get the f…k out. I advise them that I am calling the Security team to assist. 03/12/2024 GSA JKG. Booked excursion for Parafise Island today. Got to meet area & the port staff told us our group was there way too early & Company Voyages had messed up. It took me literally tapping this person on the shoulder because he was very frustrated & on cell say no bueno virgin cruises over & over to so.Many guests were waiting to here what was happening and he wasn’t answering. Then NIKOS who was very kind, explained the situation in detail. Nikos explained the tour would now leave at 230 instead of 1230 and back on ship at 730. We had reservations with friends book for a show & dinner so we couldn’t make that change. He said we would be refunded.Refunded isn’t enough really.can’t go to spa, reservations taken for food options today. Poolboacked when we came back to ship.have a torn meniscus so booked excursion that would pickup close to boat & drop back off & planned to take closest beach chair to drop off. Walking in Cozumel not an option. All or her excursions booked up. Basically very frustrated with this outcome & have a disappointed daughter whose trip this was for her 19th birthday. She begged for a virgin cruise. This is my 23rd cruise. I’ve never had an excursion fiasco like this one on any of my previous cruises. The whole thing was just really ODD & heartbreaking! Wish it would have been different & Cozumel would have beendoable at paradise beach excursion. Just wanted guest services to know so they can work on this mix up & the next guests won’t have to miss a day of cruising to a logistical mistake oneithervirfin or the excursion b. Vendor’s but as I said the vendor said over & over - no bueno virgin! I now tend to agree with him - NO BUENO VIRGIN!!!

Spa called Mrsa telling her that guest Erika will be down as a no show because she didn't turn up for her massage at 8am. Guest s showed Mrsa the appoitments on their app which stated that it was at 9am and 11am. Mrsa called back the spa to inform them that its actually 9am Erikas appoitment, the lady from spa said no she booked 8am, which guest replied that when she was booking it came on the app 9am so she assumed that was her appoitment. Guest  booked in for quarts the day after (12th)  at 7:30am in the morning instead as thats the only time they had before her excursion so she would of have to be rushing. Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: We loved Duel Reality!!!!  I gave sad face because we would have liked to go to Red Party events tonight but our excursion was delayed, and instead of a “comfortable bus” we travelled to Chichen Itza and back in an INCREDIBLY cramped and uncomfortable van.  We were rushed through the excursion once we arrived because of the delay in starting, we didn’t even get to see the giant stone head ruin that is pictured on the advertisement.  It definitely was not worth the high price we paid and we lost an entire day of fun because we chose that excursion.  I couldn’t be more disappointed with how today went and now we are exhausted.  Why make the party on the same day as excursions are scheduled?  Very poor planning on Company’s part.  So we decided to stay in the room and order food which has been a fiasco.  First, the app would not work.  After much effort, we finally got ahold of room service through phone and learned that we can’t get fries with a burger and can’t get a real margarita on the rocks, only canned.  Very frustrating.

Q: Tell us everything!, A: See guest services complaint made at 120PM today. Excursion scheduled for Parafise island. Told when we met at appropriate spot that Company had made a mistake with vendor not telling us anything instead say virgin no bueno on cell phone over & over. Nikos cane to speak to group for excursion stating the tour would now leave at 230 & return at 730. We’d made dinner & show plans with friends so we couldn’t take that option. A refund was made but I sent to guest services a refund isn’t enough I put on & took swim attire & all other excursions were booked. So couldn’t really do what we wanted on shore. Said to guest services I had a knee problem so walking is difficult. Choose swim excursion so a boat was taking me & I could sit the whole day. Instead I got back to full pools. No reservations & no way to change all the plans made for day from 1130-600. Guest  services sent back forwarded to excursion group but zero contact from them & a notification guest services thread was closed. As I said I my chat to them: never have I had a go fused vendor & an excursion group who basically believe it was messed up - too bad so sorry. Har lived this cruise until today.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The customer service and interactions with your crew has not been great. I like to cruise. This is my first Company cruise. Your staff has made me feel rushed and not welcoming. I know that’s not the intention you set forth when creating this experience. I’ve walked into a store and no one greets me. I made a purchase Monday and the clerk only spoke to tell me the total. 

Three times now I’ve been overlooked by staff in The Galley and someone else was acknowledged and served before me, even though I was there first. 

There needs to be some serious customer service/hospitality training. Please tell your crew to be kind and attentive to EVERYONE. This will probably be my last Company experience if I don’t see changes prior to Friday.

Guest s Deborah Friedman from Room 11270A and Guest s Anne Marie and Daryl Miles from Room 8334A, approached Excursion Staff to provide us their feedback regarding their experience with their excursion in Cozumel VIP Day at Anemona Beach in Punta Sur. They spent more time on the tour around Cozumel than at the beach. Guest s didn't receive refreshments (water) during the tour only on the way back from the beach. According to our Guest s what is in the description is not what we are actually offering for the high price. Guest s complained about worn-out beach chairs and dirty pillows. They also mentioned that in order to receive the service, they must call the waiters, who have an unfriendly attitude. The first thing the waiter said when they approached was that the menu only offered a limited selection of dishes, and ordering seafood would cost an extra 30 dlls. The free bar only offers a limited selection of drinks. If they ordered something else, like tequila,  they had to pay extra.  Guest s are requesting a refund for the VIP day at Anemona Beach in Punta Sur.

Guest  understood that this was out of their control however didn't mind going on the replacement boat. Guest  mentioned that out of 6 guests 2 decided to continue and waited for 20 mins. After a while the captain was upset as he didn't want to use the replacement boat. The guides were very dismissive and were using a lot of profanity while waiting. Guest  was upset by the way things were handled and did not want to waste a day with unfriendly crew, guest was looking forward to the tour as she is an avid fisher. Guest  wanted to address the issue with the STM and wanted to know if another boat from a different company could be arranged STM advised that is was not possible as tours need to be vetted before sending guests on them and that can't happen in a few hours. Guest  was offered another tour, guest declined and said she would rather freshen up and make her way to the beach club as the ordeal ruined her day. STM apologized for the guests experience and advised that his would be addressed with tour operator and shoreside team. STM advised guest to enjoy the rest of the day and would follow up with guest when she returns from the Beach Club. Guest  thanked STM for listening.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: My expectations far exceeded my experience on this ship. From all of the reviews I was ready to have a wonderful time and book the next cruise on board but this will be a one time experience with this cruise line. Good news is I've spent way less than planned and can use my money with companies that value my business.

Guest  expressed dissapointment with their experience to date. This is their first cruise with us and they expressed that our delivery has not met their expectations. Some items were promised to be in their room but did not arrive until the second day, they asked their rockstar agent about swapping their entire minibar for malibu and were met with just a no and no real discussion. They said service has been ok but they have received better and in general just feel like they have had better experiences on other cruise lines. Adding the missed port and changed itinerary has just been an added frustration.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: I have been unable to book any dinner reservations starting from about 5 weeks before the cruise until today.  I am with a group and they invited me to dinner with them tonight, otherwise I was told nothing is available at all.  I went to the blue agave about 1:15 pm today since the hours for making dinner reservations was 9-2 I was surprised no one was there.  I asked guest services and they were unable to make any reservations, or provide any assistance at all.  have tried to walk in both nights of the cruise at multiple restaurants and was never called from the waiting list.  Your website and app say there is always tables left open for walk ins, this isn’t true.   The hostess at the Italian restaurant was very rude when I asked about reservations and told me there was never any time available.  It’s frustrating to the point that I considered flying home from Nassau tomorrow and would have done so but for the tour group I am with inviting me to dinner tonight.  On the first day of the cruise I waited in the reservation line for about 30 minutes before giving up.  Your process for dining in the restaurants is convoluted and difficult to navigate.   I am on a full comp from the casino and find the lack of assistance from anyone but my tour group to be zero.  It’s a shame because the embarkation process and  other staff I have encountered are extremely pleasant, as is my room and other amenities on the ship.

More upsetting is that friends we are traveling with went in AFTER us and purchased one bottle. They have not been notified that I am aware of that it’s not available. Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Even though I understand about the medical emergency, I don’t understand why Company  Cruises did not have a plan b or c when facing a medical emergency. Company went with the easy way out: being idle for two days near Miami and changed our destination to two islands in The Bahamas ? That was not what I signed for. Simple disappointing and honestly Company to my opinion is going down in sustaining any sort of competitive advantage regarding other companies. I traveled with you last year same time and the level of service went down the drain. The use of the phones is the perfect thing for escaping guess with double charges and the supposedly language barrier at the spa to scam a guest like me. I signed from one thing changed doubled for another service that was not discussed or I was agreeable with. The list is long

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: First, I booked this cruise specifically because it was going to the Dominican Republic. I understand medical emergencies happen, however, it seems the decision to switch Nassau and how we have been pretty much stationary in the ocean is horrible. Second, I was charged for missing a HIIT class but I was there and the instructor didn’t check me in. The instructor told me to go to the front desk and they would remove the charge. Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: The Galley was pretty quiet this evening. The food lacked seasoning and wasn’t warm enough. The Greek food was hit or miss. Greek veggies were fantastic. Leg of lamb wasn’t hot and was pretty chewy. Chicken Souvlaki was overcooked. It would have been nice to have a gyro burger instead of fish.

Q: How would you rate the overall Company Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: We won’t be booking Company again, and considering that many of our followers have expressed similar experiences we feel that this is nothing unique to us. We understand that emergencies may cause changes. But when a customer comes to you with questions about how these questions will affect their visa and you tell them that you’ll get back to them by a certain time, you get back to them. You don’t keep pushing them off and ignoring them, that’s just customer service 101. It’s sad because everything else has been amazing, but the customer service standards at Guest Services fails on ever level. We’ve wasted over $10k on this cruise simply because no one would answer our questions about my partners visa. Honestly, we could have paid less and gotten better service with Carnival, it was that bad. I think the thing I’m most looking forward to at this point is sharing our full experience with our followers, I can’t recommend this cruise line to anyone.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This trip fell well below the standard that I’ve come to expect from Company. This was supposed to be a trip for my birthday that I shared with my friends. I talked up virgin because of my last experience and talked my friends into spending their money and it was subpar. Instead of spending my birthday in Dominican Republic, I spent it trying to squeeze into other places on ship that were fully booked; adding further frustration. Then, I was unable to book an excursion because the app didn’t allow and then everything was sold out because of the last minute addition. To top it all off I was EMBARRASSED when I went to the bar and it was declined. I went to guest services and was told that there was no card on file and I should her in Company’s app that said I had a card on file, and her responses was “well we don’t have one on file”. I had to walk all the way back to my room and back down to guest services to get it added, wait while “finance ran my card” and incurred another $250 hold on my card. To say I’m disappointed is an understatement. Really did not enjoy my birthday because of this and nobody cares enough to make it right.

Please do share photographs and any details you may have so that i can add this to your report. It is the blonde woman in the orange dress. GSA -Thank you very much for sharing. Would you like to meet with security? Yes. My husband would like to. But we aren’t going to leave the room again tonight. Maybe she will sober up before tomorrow. What can I do now about the guest loot and bar tab that I haven’t used. I am afraid to leave my room and we had planned to go shopping and to the casino?if security can call or come here he would be glad to speak with them. I am sorry you are in fear, This is not right or fair to you that this woman has made you feel this kind of way. Our security will take care of this if you are willing to meet and make a statement. 3/23/24 GSA CANSU - Companys poor planning is very disappointing. I am going to say it’s becusse if the infantile age of your cruise line. I called us missing Bimini days ago looking at the wind and weather forecast. You all as a cruise line should have done better. Putting the crew , and ship and guests at potential harms way is uncalled for. Never sail into a storm. And even if we could have docked in Bimini it would have been awful and flooded. So what is the point. You should have stayed off the coast of Cuba or more towards Mexico where there was a higher possibility of sunshine and better seas. Also so your crew didn’t have to scramble to get todays events going.I also hate that you could have planned better to not make an announcement and ask us up at 8 am in the room we come to sleep and not be disturbed. If I wanted to be disturbed I would have traveled with my children. Wake us up in the room at 8 am. You could have avoided this. Poor poor planning on virgins part. I don’t care it’s a sea day. I know why you couldn’t dock and understand it. But you could have planned and prepared better ahead of time. Disney even send their guests notice days before warning they will most likely not be docking at castaway. I guess that is what comes with experience. No shows during the day. Just places to spend more money. Shops and casino. And no sports area to watch basketball that isn’t in a echoing hall and crowded with trivia. It’s hard to find a lounge to sit and enjoy music with out of being 1000 decibels. And why why wake us up for this dreary day. It could have been handled last night!!

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Gede was an excellent server! But we didn't enjoy the food here.  I had the fried chicken sandwich which was very dry and the black bun was too hard to enjoy. The fries, churrros with the strawberry sauce and Yass Queen cocktail were great.  My husband had eggs,potatoes and impossible sausage.  His egg was not cooked to medium as requested and the side of bacon was alright.  He expected it to be smoky but it was sweet.  He had the cheesecake which was decent. I would come back here only for the churrros and bottomless Yasss Queen!

3/26/2024 At 7:45pm, a guest reported that the carpet in front of the bathroom door was wet. Upon inspection by FM and RA, a wet carpet measuring approximately 10 square cm was found in the room. Further investigation revealed that the AC drain was not draining, resulting in water overflowing onto the floor. The water was extracted from the technical space and carpet. AIMS was created for HVAC #SCL1240012932, and SS was informed. The guest declined to have a blower placed in the room as they wished to stay there.

Following happened in WTP room today 03/25/2024:
An incorrect ruling has been made today during a hand in our $120 "Vegas Baby" poker tournament and the affected player (Sammy Fairchild) was very upset about it, suggesting the entire tournament outcome was altered by the ruling. After the ruling, Guest  immediately said “that’s wrong”. He then got up and scanned WTP QR code we have for the TDA rules and began to look through the rules. Guest  then came up to the desk showing a google result for a rule that does not apply and said “See, I told you that you were wrong, you don’t know the rules”. 
After he was eliminated from the tournament, Guest  came over to the WTP room manager who tried to offer an explanation to him, took full ownership of the issue and apologized to him. Guest  proceeded to be nasty, and the WTP manager tried to defuse the situation, but the Guest  didn’t care and was intent on being loud and badgering the WTP manager for being wrong.
During his complaint to the WTP manager he said he was intent on leaving a bad review and wanted contact info of the person in charge.

The guest arrived at Extra Company Restaurant seeking accommodation, addressing the Restaurant Supervisor. However, due to the bustling evening, the supervisor could only offer a seat at the bar counter, as it was the only available option at the time. The guest insisted on a regular table immediately.

The Restaurant Manager intervened, explaining that all regular tables were fully booked but the guest could return at 9:00 PM or accept a high-top table for the moment. In response, the guest began to shout profanities (f+++) at the Manager, expressing frustration over losing $10,000 at the casino, mentioning a diabetic medical condition and a waiting time of over 30minutes in Korean BBQ restaurant. 

Despite the guest's outburst, the Manager calmly asked him to watch his language and find a solution. After venting his frustrations, the guest suddenly left, leaving the situation unresolved.

Q: Quality of the food?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This is my second time cruise with Company, Scarlett Lady. The food is too exotic, doesn't have to be that exotic. It was generally bland as well. Not just in the Galley but everywhere. 

Secondly, this ship is full of varied age groups. Why do you play music only directed toward 20 somethings? It ridiculous amount of rap and club music. Some of us want classics and 80s, 90s, country and pop. 

I was also disappointed in how many activities were booked up and unavailable. 

Finally, it feel like the food is overly filling somehow. I'd eat a very small
Meal but feel like I just ate Thanksgiving dinner. It made me feel like there was a filler in the food or something. I rarely drink anymore, the drinks seem watered down, like a very low percentage of alcohol in them. 

Finally, why do you close all the bars down? There are areas of the boat that we would want to hang out in and my husband would have to go on a search to find a bar for beer several stories down. 

I don't know, it didn't feel like the same cruise second time around. 

Thank you for the NO single use plastic, very much appreciate that and wish everyone operated that way.

Q: Tell us everything!, A: Our first virgin was a much more positive experience. We have had multiple circumstances where our account declined and where publicly told it was due to our card declining when was that was the case. Our bed was turned down to a couch when we did not request this. When we asked why this happened the staff member was adamant we made this request via the app. At the spa, when I checked in, I was never offer a robe or to check in my bag or to change and when I asked I was I told I declined however I was just told to wait. While we absolutely loved our first cruise and wanted to make Company our cruise line of choice we see reconsidering this now. Overall the staff has been very pleasant and the food has been great however we are very surprised by the multiple issues we have had.
